title: Various - The Wire - Five Themes (2009) [FLAC]
description:
As a big fan of The Wire, I wanted to get hold of the different versions of the theme - Way Down in the Hole. Four of them are available on the Wire soundtrack along with a bunch of rap-type tracks that I have no interest in. I grabbed three of the tracks from the soundtrack then found the longer Tom Waits version on his album - Franks Wild Years and the missing Steve Earle track from his album - Washington Square Serenade.

I put this together for myself but here it is if someone else has a use for it. Please leave a comment if you download and seed at least 1:1. Cheers.

01 The Blind Boys of Alabama - Way Down in the Hole

02 Tom Waits - Way Down in the Hole

03 The Neville Brothers - Way Down in the Hole

04 Domaje - Way Down in the Hole

05 Steve Earle - Way Down in the Hole

Cue sheet included
